body:
This is fixed on 6.0.6: https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-usefieldarray-nested-arrays-uiigf

Thanks for the reporting üëç

@bluebill1049 I went to the codesandbox that you created and it didnt work. I hit submit when the page loads, look at the console, and it shows 3 items. Remove an item, hit submit again, and look at the console and it still shoes 3 items. The UI is showing 2 but the form data is still 3.
oh wow, you are right, how the hell it was working for me back then...

oh shit, it didn't save and it's still on 6.0.5... 

https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-usefieldarray-nested-arrays-uiigf?file=/src/index.js

one important line that i removed to get it working, useFieldArray doesn't work with custom register which is register at useEffect.
sorry, I found a different bug tho. submit an empty form, I will investigate this problem.
Thanks! I like what you are doing! I look forward to seeing this project be successful!
fixed: https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-usefieldarray-nested-arrays-uiigf?file=/src/src/useForm.ts will have a patch on this soon.

issue.title: fix #2240 issue with unmounted data gets updated when shouldUnregister

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: üìã React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)
